name: SerializedGear
description: Entity representing serialized gear in the military unit

division_name.description: The division the gear is assigned to, based on the assigned soldier.

last_checked_date.description: Date the gear was last checked or serviced

armory_status.description: Whether the gear is with the soldier or deposited

deposit_location.description: Specific location where the gear is deposited (only applies when armory_status is 'in_deposit')

last_signed_by.description: Full name of the last soldier who signed for this gear.

comments.description: Additional comments or notes about the gear.
